item.title: Reverend's Colt
item.description: Reverend's Colt is a 1970 Spanish-Italian Spaghetti Western directed by León Klimovsky.

item.title: Apache Fury
item.description: Apache Fury is a 1964 Italian-Spanish Spaghetti Western directed and co-written by José María Elorrieta. It was based on a novel by Eduardo Guzman.

item.title: Cipolla Colt
item.description: Cry, Onion! is a 1975 Spaghetti Western comedy film directed by Enzo G. Castellari. It is openly comedic and parodic.

item.title: White Comanche
item.description: White Comanche or Comanche blanco or Rio Honcho is a 1968 paella western starring William Shatner in two roles.

item.title: More Dollars for the MacGregors
item.description: More Dollars for the MacGregors is a 1970 Spaghetti Western film directed by José Luis Merino and starring Peter Lee Lawrence, Carlos Quiney and Malisa Longo.
